com.sort

Class SampleSort

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sort.SampleSort

  • public class SampleSort
extends java.lang.Object
    This class generates samples data, fetches pivots from samples, partitions and uploads data to S3.

      Phase 2 : Find Pivots (Run by Server) This method is to create pivots from the generated samples
      java.lang.String getSamples(java.util.ArrayList<SortObject> sortRecords, int w, int p)
      This method is to get the samples from the sorted records.
      void partitionAndUploadData(java.lang.String pivots, int ClientId)
      Phase 3 : Partition and Exchange (Run by Client) Partitions the sorted records according to the pivots and uploads the data to S3
      void phaseFour(int clientId)
      Phase 4 (Merge Partitions) This method reads the files from S3 and concatenates them
      java.lang.String readAndSampleData(int clientId)
      Phase 1 (Read, Sort and Sample Local Data) (Run by Client) This method reads the files from S3 and generates samples
